name: Light&Shadow
description:
Platform Game in the Universe with 2 Suns and 5 Planets. 

How to play:
Jump from planet to planet. Each planet has it's own gravity and orbital asteroids of the same color: when you're overlapped by an asteroid you are attracted by it's planet gravity.  Slice the columns to climb the top red coin, wait for an asteroid to pass and change gravity. 5 planets, 5 gravities. 

Keys to play:
WASD to move, Space to Jump
Lmouse to Slice (column,boxes) or Destroy (rocks)
Rmouse Pressed to Freeze time for all the Universe except the Player
Rmouse clicked to speed up the player
TAB or Mousewheel to Zoom Camera In/Out
1 to restart on planet1 (you will need it when you touch 2 asteroids during planet migration and stay in space orbiting crazy between 2)
Esc to exit
